alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A line of heavy downpours will impact portions of northeastern Norfolk, southwestern Suffolk, southeastern Middlesex and northwestern Plymouth Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers along a line extending from near Brookline to Pembroke. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Boston, Brockton, Quincy, Newton, Brookline, Weymouth, Braintree, Randolph, Needham, Norwood, Wellesley, Milton, Stoughton, Marshfield, Dedham, Hingham, Canton, Pembroke, Rockland and Abington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
